site_name: Land adjacent to Northwick Park Hospital, Nightingale Avenue, London, HA1 3GX
description: Non-material amendment to the wording of condition 2 (approved drawings to reflect design amendments to Block C4) of planning permission 20/0701  of Full Planning Permission reference 20/0701 dated 16 March, 2023, for Full planning permission for demolition of existing buildings and structures on the site, all site preparation works for a residential led mixed-use development comprising new homes, associated car and cycle spaces, a replacement nursery, commercial space, associated highways improvements, open space, hard and soft landscaping and public realm works subject to a deed of agreement under Section 106 of the Town and Country Planning Act dated the 16th of March 2023.
